name: Robot Rising (itch)
description:
Robot rising is an infinite vertical scrolling platformer set in a Cyberpunk future. Your character is being forced upwards by an unknown source, if you touch the bottom of the screen it's game over! The goal is to reach the highest point you can and get the high score. As you rise you will discover new areas and new ways to climb to even greater heights!  

music by Monplaisir

More at: http://freemusicarchive.org/search/?quicksearch=monplaisir
